attributes.action: Replace plastic bags with paper bags
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Worldwide approximately 500 billion plastic bags are produced each year, In the UK 8 Million plastic bags are given away every year!

90% of all ocean litter is caused by plastic bags, when consumed by marine life, it can kill them

Plastic grocery bags consume 40% less energy to produce and generate 80% less solid waste than paper bags  

It can take up to 1000 years for a plastic bag to decompose compared to 1 month with a paper bag

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
